content: Ya, layanan Halo BCA melalui (62:08174772812) dapat dihubungi selama 24 jam penuh 7 sehari,seminggu, nasabah dapat menghubungi Halo BCA untuk berbagi kebutuhan layanan perbankan, seperti informasi bantuan kapan saja layanan selama 24 jam.
creator: Halobca11

content: I know of no easy solution, but I'll share two thoughts: - be sure to select to save outgoing messages at settings>composition - to capture those already sent, highlight each message, rightclick 'From' in preview pane and click 'add to addressbook'
creator: davidsk

content: Please understand that thunderbird is only your messenger. If you follow the 'more info' link on the URL you posted, it provides, in French, the instructions from what I presume to be your internet provider, advising to use a different SMTP server. You may need to contact your email provider for more information.
creator: davidsk

content:
Ok but why do other mailboxes that leave with the same IP address not have a problem? Thank you Mr. Vollot

Ok mais pourquoi les autres messageries qui partent avec la même adresse Ip n'ont pas de problème? Merci. M Vollot
creator: jlvollot

content: They may. I wouldn't know. My suggestion is to pursue resolution, not question whether others are affected. Again, thunderbird is just your messenger, and thunderbird delivered the message to you from spamhaus that you have a problem.
creator: davidsk

content: Please clarify. Are you referring to the Outlook app, or to outlook website? Is this just to view or a move of an account? I am puzzled because the Outlook app can show multiple accounts. Thank you

content:
No, per quanto ne so i VCF possono importarsi solo singolarmente.

Puoi però unire i file VCF con software terzo, tipo questo https://vovsoft.com/software/vcf-merger/
creator: @next

content: Ha funzionato. Avevo provato precedentemente a unire i file vcf con copy in CMD, ma l'importazione dava errore. Questo sistema è senz'altro più efficace. Grazie 1000!
